dt-option.name: searchBuilder.conditions[type].active
dt-option.summary: Function to determine if the criteria is active

type.description: This function returns a boolean representing whether the criteria should be included or not.

dt-option.description:
This function returns a boolean representing whether the criteria should be included or not. It takes 2 parameters.
* `val` the array of value elements that belong to this criteria. * `that` the criteria instance that is being checked.
The internals of the function are down to the functionality that you wish to create. Some examples are shown below for select and input elements
